Name: Wilsons Hussars
Details: In 3018, a corrupt Kurita official framed and successfully sued the Hussars for bribery causing the MRB courts to withhold payment for their contracts sucessfully carried out, By 3021 had fallen from lusty heights and went rouge. After a disastrous defeat, the Hussars terminated employment with Redjack Ryan and picked up a contract with Helmar Valasek.
